values: 离开（某处）；切断；停止；中止；没有；不再供应；（脱）掉（衣服）；（取）下（首饰）；减掉；扣掉；（在时间或空间上）距离；（机器、电灯等）关掉；不再运转；全部地；不工作；不上学；休息；腐坏；变质；向一边；进入昏迷状态
离开；远离；背离；从…离开；从…分离；从…移开；偏离…；从（某地点）向外；从（主要道路或地点）旁边；在…之外；在（海岸以外的）海上；脱落；减去；不在工作状态；休假；取消；（价格）降低；离（某地）不远；在…附近；停服；停用（药物等）；戒…；从（交通工具）上下来；<口>从…（获得）
不新鲜的；变质的；较差的；腐坏的；不正常的；状态不佳的；表现欠佳的；不合适的；不公正的；不友好的；敌对的；在远离中心（或主要区域）的；越位的；不再举行的；延期的；不再生效的；取消的；（人）不工作的；休息着的；空闲的；（路等）分支的；次要的；非主要的；低于标准的；（商业季节等）萧条的；淡的；（可能性）极小的

谋杀；消灭；终止；离开；出发；启程；走开；滚开；站开；<美俚>杀死（某人）；<美俚>跟…性交

不让…接近；避免侵占；没有发生, 没有出现；避免吃、喝或吸烟；避开
脱落；掉；掉落

bilingual.source: You mustn't go off on your own.
"Help her off the road," Mrs Gandhi prompted.
bilingual.target: “帮她离开马路，”甘地夫人催促道。

bilingual.source: Aladdin and the genie spin off stage to the left.
bilingual.target: 阿拉丁和精灵旋转着离开舞台左侧。

bilingual.source: The servant hurried off and brought the little work-driver back.
bilingual.target: 仆人赶紧离开并带回了那个小工头。

bilingual.source: He hung up the phone and went off in a hurry.
bilingual.target: 他挂了电话，匆忙地离开了。

bilingual.source: In the daytime they leave their burrows and set off in search of food.
bilingual.target: 白天它们离开洞穴寻找食物。

bilingual.source: I told my family why we should turn off the light when we leave a room.
bilingual.target: 我告诉家人为什么我们离开房间时要关灯。

bilingual.source: Please turn off the lights before you leave.
Turn off the lights before you leave.
Cary the injured player off the field.
bilingual.target: 搬运受伤的球员离开球场。

list.abstract: off是一个英语单词，可以用作介词、形容词、副词、动词、名词，意思是起跑或者杀死，例如“Butnowitwascutoff”。

yingyinNormal.en: How do you get it off the ground?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那怎么离开地面呢？

yingyinNormal.en: For what? To get us the hell off this island.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？我们就可以离开这个岛。

yingyinNormal.en: That way, they're tied to the table and they can't take off.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样，他们就不会离开这里了。

yingyinNormal.en: If you leave now, I will chop off my hand and give it to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只要你愿意离开，我就把手砍下来送你！

yingyinNormal.en: We need to find Peter now and get off this damn planet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们现在得找到彼得，然后赶紧离开这个鬼地方。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's get the contestants out of their isolation booths. And they're off.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请参赛者离开隔离区，他们出发了。

yingyinNormal.en: It was hard saying goodbye to my hometown. Heading off on my own.
yingyinNormal.zh: 离开家乡确实曾让我伤怀，一个人孤单前行。

yingyinNormal.en: I got half a mom. Well, my mom took off when I was a kid.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只能算有半个妈妈，她在我还很小的时候就离开了。

yingyinNormal.en: Our only way off this island and now it's in pieces. Satisfied?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们唯一离开这个岛的方法已经摔碎了，你满意了？

yingyinNormal.en: And told her off. But she refused to leave and the palace guards chased her from the party! I pity the prince. Such bad taste.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还叫她离开，但她拒绝离开，然后宫廷守卫还去舞会上抓她。真为王子感到可惜，品味真差。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, yes. I'm quite content. 'Cause I don't wanna get off this island.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，我满意极了，因为我一点也不想离开这个岛。

yingyinNormal.en: What? Are you kidding me? And get him off his routine? No, no, no.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？开什么玩笑？让他离开他的日常生活？不，不，不。

yingyinNormal.en: Our mission does not work if the people on Earth are dead by the time we pull it off.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们离开的时候地球上的人都死了，我们的任务就失败了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, it's okay, between him not talking, him talking and him. I'm better off alone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没事，考虑到他不说话，他说的话，还有他，我最好还是离开吧。

yingyinNormal.en: If you think M's signing off on that, you're insane. He won't let you out of his sight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是疯了才觉得M会同意你去，他不会让你离开他的视线一步。

yingyinNormal.en: But you should know, she is so much fun. A wonderful person. Please, don't blow her off.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是你应该知道，她是很风趣的，很棒的一个人。拜托，请别离开她。

yingyinNormal.en: And then you warned Trey that Bishop was coming after him, and that's why he took off. I have to go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你警告了特雷，毕夏普会追杀他，所以他才选择离开？我得走了。

yingyinNormal.en: Miss Crawly! Come on, you guys, out, out of here. Come on, off the stage. Thank you so much.
yingyinNormal.zh: 蜥太太！好了，姑娘们，别捣乱，好了，离开舞台，快走，谢谢你们啦。

yingyinNormal.en: But most of the volunteers were hookers or neurotics who would crack up 10 days off Earth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可大部分志愿者都是妓女，或者精神高度敏感，离开地球10天就会崩溃。

yingyinNormal.en: You think he was gonna let you off without a scratch? You'd still be standing there if I hadn't hit you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你以为他会让你毫发无损地离开？如果不是我把你割伤了，你现在还站在那里呢。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 脱机地；未连线地；离线地

word_family.mean: adv. 离开；在某地以外；掉；开；出发；结束；停止；关闭；断开；获得；拥有；一次的产量

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 关掉；让人倒胃口；让人扫兴；转上另一条路
动身；出发；引爆(炸弹)；拉响(警报等)；引发；激起
成功完成(困难的事情)；车停靠路边
不要上(路)；远离(某地)；保持熄灭
情况更坏；处境更糟；更不幸；更贫困

sense_info_list.en: so as to be removed or separated
sense_info_list.zh: 去掉; 分开; 远离

examination_example.sentence: But once we rip <highlight>off</highlight> the band-aid, tuck our smartphones in our pockets and look up, it doesn't hurt so bad.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但一旦我们撕掉创可贴，把智能手机塞进口袋，抬头一看，就没那么疼了。

examination_example.sentence: We're doing these things because we know they help people stay <highlight>off</highlight> benefits and help those on benefits get into work faster.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们做这些事情是因为我们知道它们能帮助人们远离救济金，而且帮助那些得到救济金的人更快找到工作。

examination_example.sentence: But for the most part, these benefits seem thin, uncertain, and far <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在大多数情况下，这些好处似乎是微乎其微的、不确定的以及遥远的。

sense_info_list.zh: (better off)比以前好; 比以前宽裕

examination_example.sentence: Even when you win, you end up no better <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使你赢了，你也不会变得更好。

examination_example.sentence: It seems most people would be better <highlight>off</highlight> if they could shorten their commutes to work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果能缩短上下班的时间，大多数人的生活似乎会更好。

examination_example.sentence: In limited respects, perhaps the recession will leave society better <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在有限的方面，也许经济衰退会让社会变得更好。

examination_example.sentence: Scandinavian Airlines decided to start up a short retraining program that reskilled the laid-<highlight>off</highlight> workers to support hospital staff.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 斯堪的纳维亚航空公司决定启动一个短期的再培训项目，重新培训下岗工人，以支持医院员工。

examination_example.sentence: If you're not convinced of the inherent value in taking a year <highlight>off</highlight> to explore interests, then consider its financial impact on future academic choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不相信休学一年具有发掘兴趣的内在价值，那么不妨考虑一下这种行为对于未来学业选择上的经济影响。

examination_example.sentence: Millennials remember their father and mother both were laid <highlight>off</highlight>. They blame it on the manufacturing recession.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 千禧一代记得他们的父母都被解雇了。他们将其归咎于制造业衰退。

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes storms blew the vessels far <highlight>off</highlight> their course, and often calm brought unbearably long delay.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时风暴会将船只吹离航线，而平静通常会使船只处于难以忍受的长时间的延误。

sense_info_list.zh: 离开; 出发; 启动

examination_example.sentence: Every Saturday morning, at 9 am, more than 50, 000 runners set <highlight>off</highlight> to run 5km around their local park.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每周六上午9点，超过50，000名跑步者出发绕着他们当地的公园跑5公里。

examination_example.sentence: On May 31st Microsoft set <highlight>off</highlight> the row.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 5月31日，微软挑起了这场争论。

sense_info_list.zh: 结束; 停止; 取消

examination_example.sentence: You may decide it's best to hold <highlight>off</highlight> on voicing your opinion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以决定最好不要发表你的意见。

examination_example.sentence: Yet satisfaction with these material purchases wears <highlight>off</highlight> fairly quickly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，购买这些物质的满足感很快就消失了。

examination_example.sentence: Her example can't be knocked <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她的榜样不可磨灭。

examination_example.sentence: Factors will encourage us towards certain interpretations but at the same time obscure or even close <highlight>off</highlight> others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 各种因素会鼓励我们做出某些解释，但同时也会模糊甚至封闭其他解释。

examination_example.sentence: Few switch DNT on now, but if tracking is <highlight>off</highlight> it will stay <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在很少有人打开“禁追踪”选项，但如果追踪选项处于关闭状态，它就会一直处于关闭状态。

examination_example.sentence: The hardest task that television asks of anyone is to turn the power <highlight>off</highlight> after he has turned it on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电视要求任何人完成的最困难的任务是在他打开电源后将其关闭。

sense_info_list.zh: (pull off)成功完成; 靠边停车

examination_example.sentence: This one may be more difficult to pull <highlight>off</highlight>, but it can go a long way to achieving results.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一个可能更难完成，但它可以对实现结果有很大帮助。

examination_example.sentence: And what's the best way to pull <highlight>off</highlight> one that enhances our goals?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 实现我们目标的最好方法是什么？

examination_example.sentence: These commutes were reportedly more enjoyable compared with those without communication, which makes absolute sense, since human beings thrive <highlight>off</highlight> of social connections.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据报道，与没有交流的通勤相比，这些通勤更令人愉快，这是绝对有道理的，因为人类依靠社会联系而繁荣。

examination_example.sentence: What is in question is not the retrieval of an absolute meaning that can be read <highlight>off</highlight> and checked for accuracy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 需要思考的东西不在于从文章中能读出来并且能检验其准确性的那些绝对的含义。

examination_example.sentence: It seems worthless to take <highlight>off</highlight>-campus courses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 参加校外课程似乎毫无价值。

examination_example.sentence: The Conservatives may abandon "<highlight>off</highlight>-plan" building.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 保守党可能会放弃“计划外”的建筑。

examination_example.sentence: Bob Liodice says consumers will be worse <highlight>off</highlight> if the industry cannot collect information about their preferences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Bob Liodice表示，如果该行业无法收集消费者偏好的信息，他们的处境将会更糟。

sense_info_list.zh: (fend off)挡开; 抵挡; 抵御

examination_example.sentence: Healthy trees are also better able to fend <highlight>off</highlight> insects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 健康的树木也能更好地抵御昆虫。

sense_info_list.zh: (rip off)漫天要价; 坑骗; 剥削

examination_example.sentence: The common idea that high CEO pay is mainly about ripping people <highlight>off</highlight> doesn't explain history very well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们普遍认为，首席执行官的高薪主要是为了剥削他人，这种观点并不能很好地解释历史。

examination_example.sentence: If you have surplus vegetables, you'll do a vegetable soup, and all fruits threatening to "go <highlight>off</highlight>" will be cooked or juiced.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你有多余的蔬菜，你可以做一个蔬菜汤，而且所有可能会变质的水果都可以被煮熟或榨汁。

sense_info_list.zh: 临场发挥不佳的; 令人不满意的

word_usage.usage:
off表示休假或不工作，若用作副词，放在名词之后；若用作介词，放在名词之前。
例：I’ll have four days off. 我要休4天假。
    Mr Smith is off duty today. 史密斯先生今天不上班。

off用来指时间或距离有多远，与 away 同义，有时可换用。
例：The exam is only two weeks off (away). 考试只两周了。

off可与well/badly/worse等副词连用构成形容词，表示“处于……境况的”。
例：...consumers will be worse off if the industry cannot collect information about their preferences. 
        如果该行业不能收集有关消费者偏好的信息，消费者的情况会更糟。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 关；让人倒胃口；让人扫兴；转上另一条路

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 脱机地；未连线地；离线地

word_family.mean: adv. 离开；在某地以外；掉；开；出发；结束；停止；关闭；断开；获得；拥有；一次的产量

sense_info_list.en: so as to be removed or separated
sense_info_list.zh: 去掉; 分开; 远离

examination_example.sentence: During the meal, the man's wedding ring slipped <highlight>off</highlight> his finger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 吃饭时，男人的结婚戒指从手指上滑落。

examination_example.sentence: This has wiped 6% <highlight>off</highlight> the value of the soft tissue paper market in the UK.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这使得英国的卫生纸市场价值缩水了6%。

examination_example.sentence: It keeps many otherwise qualified women <highlight>off</highlight> the runway.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它让许多其他方面合格的女性无法走上T台。

examination_example.sentence: When she started saying nice things about Hitler, Microsoft turned her <highlight>off</highlight> and deleted her ugliest messages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当它开始说希特勒的好话时，微软关闭了它，并删除了它最丑陋的信息。

examination_example.sentence: New York State plans to shut <highlight>off</highlight> the thundering waters of Niagara Falls - gain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 纽约州计划关闭尼亚加拉瀑布雷鸣般的水域。

examination_example.sentence: The American side of the falls were shut <highlight>off</highlight> in 1969 to study the buildup of rock at the base of the falls.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了研究瀑布底部的岩石堆积，位于美国的一侧的瀑布于1969年被关停。

examination_example.sentence: An endangered species of whale is experiencing a small-baby boom <highlight>off</highlight> the coast of America.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一种濒临灭绝的鲸鱼正在美国海岸经历一场小规模的生育高峰。

examination_example.sentence: He sailed <highlight>off</highlight> the coastal island in the Philippines ten years ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 十年前，他在菲律宾的沿海岛屿上航行。

examination_example.sentence: A tour boat turned over <highlight>off</highlight> the coast of Nicaragua, killing at least 13 people and leaving more passengers missing, official said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 官员说，一艘游船在尼加拉瓜海岸翻船，造成至少 13 人死亡，更多乘客失踪。

sense_info_list.zh: (better off)比以前好; 比以前宽裕

examination_example.sentence: Most urban Africans live in slums (贫民窟) ; migrants are often not much better <highlight>off</highlight> than they were in the countryside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数城市非洲人住在贫民窟;移居者的境况通常并不比他们在农村时好多少。

examination_example.sentence: They attract migrants who want to be better <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们吸引了想要过得更好的移居者。

examination_example.sentence: A new study published in the journal Learning & Memory finds you're probably better <highlight>off</highlight> sleeping than making last-minute preparations for a test.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最重要的是，一项新的研究发现，睡觉可能比最后时刻准备考试要好。

examination_example.sentence: "It still has to go into a container. "That is, in part, why smaller and softer containers have taken <highlight>off</highlight>-they fit into backpacks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “它必须放入容器中。”这在一定程度上就是为什么更小、更柔软的容器可以放进背包的原因。

examination_example.sentence: Now that sales are taking <highlight>off</highlight>, the vast majority of bike dealers are asking Cocalis when he'll make an ebike available.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在销量突然开始上升，绝大多数自行车经销商都在问Cocalis什么时候能推出电动自行车。

examination_example.sentence: Crowdfunding has taken <highlight>off</highlight> in recent years for everything from making movies to producing water-saving gadgets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 近年来，从制作电影到生产节水小工具，众筹已经在各个领域兴起。

examination_example.sentence: Most of stock clerks try to get Friday night <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数存货职员都会在周五晚上休息。

examination_example.sentence: He will be <highlight>off</highlight> duty the whole day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他一整天都不上班。

examination_example.sentence: She is having her day <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她今天休假。

examination_example.sentence: The hollowed-out A300 was stripped of everything potentially harmful to the environment and sunk <highlight>off</highlight> the Aegean coast today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这架中空的 A300 被拆除了所有可能对环境有害的物品，于今日在爱琴海沿岸沉海。

examination_example.sentence: The camera could be the thing that proves that they didn't steal the $20, or knock the vase <highlight>off</highlight> the table.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 摄像头可能是证明他们没有偷那20美元，或是没有把花瓶从桌子上摔下来的证据。

sense_info_list.zh: 离开; 出发; 启动

examination_example.sentence: He wound up in my back seat before I could finally get <highlight>off</highlight> the road, stop and get out of the car.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我还没来得及离开马路，停下来下车，他就坐到了我的后座上。

examination_example.sentence: What time are you heading <highlight>off</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你什么时候出发？

examination_example.sentence: Aderhold is limiting the extra classes that students are allowed to take <highlight>off</highlight> campus.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿德霍尔德正在限制学生在校外选修的额外课程。

examination_example.sentence: Asian-American students have been eager participants in a state program that permits them to take summer classes <highlight>off</highlight> campus for high school credit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚裔美国学生一直积极参与一项州立项目，该项目允许他们在校外参加暑期课程，以获得高中学分。

sense_info_list.zh: 结束; 停止; 取消

examination_example.sentence: But I get <highlight>off</highlight> the phone pretty quickly when I call.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是我打电话的时候会很快挂掉电话。

examination_example.sentence: There are plenty of ways to keep track of your job search and making the effort to simplify your job search will pay <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有很多方法可以跟踪你的求职情况，并努力简化你的成功求职过程。

examination_example.sentence: Stress is so normalized that it is easy for women to shrug <highlight>off</highlight> those symptoms as simply the consequences of stress.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 压力是如此的正常，以至于女性很容易将这些症状仅仅视为压力的后果而置之不理。

examination_example.sentence: Here comes Chauncy, just trying to get food for him and his Mom <highlight>off</highlight> the grace of other people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乔西来了，只是想从其他人的恩惠中为他和他的妈妈获取食物。

sense_info_list.zh: (fend off)挡开; 抵挡; 抵御
(rip off)漫天要价; 坑骗; 剥削
临场发挥不佳的; 令人不满意的
(pull off)成功完成; 靠边停车

exam_freq_info.chinese: (pay off)取得成功; 得到好结果

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 关；让人倒胃口；让人扫兴；转上另一条路
请假；起飞；急速离开；成功
不让…接近；避免侵占；没有发生；没有出现；避免吃、喝或吸烟；避开
中线开球；以中线开球形式开始(或继续)比赛；开始

examination_example.sentence: My brother, of course, raced <highlight>off</highlight> to be with his friends, while I had plenty to do myself.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，我哥哥跑去和他的朋友们待在一起，而我自己有很多事情要做。

examination_example.sentence: Jeff had hunted in Iowa before Thanksgiving with his dog, Rosie, but the gun shots had scared the dog <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 感恩节前夕，Jeff和他的狗Rosie在爱荷华州打猎，但是枪声把狗吓跑了。

examination_example.sentence: Once fire and emergency people arrive, Larry and the other man backed <highlight>off</highlight> and let them go to work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦消防和急救人员到达，拉里和另一名男子后退，让他们去工作。

examination_example.sentence: Thankfully, Jeff stayed calm and turned <highlight>off</highlight> the gas quickly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谢天谢地，杰夫保持冷静，迅速关掉了煤气。

examination_example.sentence: Turn <highlight>off</highlight> the radio.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关掉收音机。

examination_example.sentence: Could you turn that <highlight>off</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你能把它关掉吗？

examination_example.sentence: I watched him take <highlight>off</highlight> his basketball uniform and replace it with a baseball uniform.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我看着他脱下篮球服，换上棒球服。

examination_example.sentence: Now I can check one more thing <highlight>off</highlight> my list.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在我可以又划掉清单上的一项安排了。

examination_example.sentence: The coach is able to focus on the kids while the other parents are relieved to be <highlight>off</highlight> the hook for another season.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 教练可以把注意力集中在孩子身上，而其他家长则可以松一口气，不用再为下一个赛季操心了。

examination_example.sentence: Dr. Block, I need to take a few days <highlight>off</highlight> because my father is coming over to visit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 洛克医生，我需要请几天假，因为我父亲要来看我。

examination_example.sentence: This brief visit with Mother Nature cost me two days <highlight>off</highlight> from work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这次对大自然的短暂造访害我请了两天假。

examination_example.sentence: After six days, it is wise to take a day <highlight>off</highlight> to rest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 六天后，放假休息一天是明智之举。

examination_example.sentence: I was turning the page, but the draft wind from the turn caused the spare pages to fall <highlight>off</highlight> the stand.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我正在翻页，但是翻页时的风使多余的谱页从架子上掉了下来。

examination_example.sentence: I didn't think about it much until a morning last week when I knocked my favorite teapot <highlight>off</highlight> the table.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到上周的一个早上，当我把我最喜欢的茶壶从桌子上碰掉的时候，我才想了很多。

examination_example.sentence: Ground water collects on the sheet until small drops of water form, run down the material and fall <highlight>off</highlight> into the cup.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 地表水在塑料板上凝聚形成水滴，然后顺流落入杯中。

examination_example.sentence: We can't put <highlight>off</highlight> buying a new printer for our company.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不能推迟为公司买一台新打印机。

examination_example.sentence: To put <highlight>off</highlight> a meeting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 推迟会议。

examination_example.sentence: This year, 25, 310 students who have accepted places in higher education institutions have put <highlight>off</highlight> their entry until next year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年，已经被高等教育机构录取的25310名学生已经将入学日期推迟到明年。

examination_example.sentence: It prevents people who are cut <highlight>off</highlight> from society falling victim to cheaters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它防止与社会隔绝的人成为骗子的牺牲品。

examination_example.sentence: Experts say the way you design your home could play a role in whether you pack on the pounds or keep them <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 专家说，你设计房子的方式可能会影响你是增加体重还是保持体重。

sense_info_list.zh: (pay off)取得成功; 得到好结果

examination_example.sentence: Paulo's hunch (直觉) paid <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 保罗的直觉得到了回报。

examination_example.sentence: Hard work pays <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 功夫不负有心人。

examination_example.sentence: The environmental challenges are significant but the efforts made by the Tanzania National Park Authority seem to be paying <highlight>off</highlight> .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然环境保护的难度巨大，但是坦桑尼亚国家公园管理局为之所做的努力似乎正见成效。

examination_example.sentence: To show <highlight>off</highlight> their hunting skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 来炫耀他们的狩猎技巧。

examination_example.sentence: It lasted for more than a year, and kicked <highlight>off</highlight> the civil-rights movement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它持续了一年多的时间，拉开了民权运动的序幕。

examination_example.sentence: The first day I shut it <highlight>off</highlight> because I had placed it within arm's reach.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一天，我把它关掉了，因为我把它放在伸手可及的地方。

examination_example.sentence: The bay was bathed in sunshine, and there was a group of kayakers around 150m <highlight>off</highlight> the shore.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 海湾沐浴在阳光下，在离海岸约150米的地方有一群皮划艇运动员。

examination_example.sentence: Those were also at the core (核心) of our relationship <highlight>off</highlight> the screen.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些也是我们在银幕下的核心关系。

examination_example.sentence: But it also set <highlight>off</highlight> the Montgomery bus boycott.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但这也引发了蒙哥马利巴士抵制运动。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (hit it off)一见如故; 投缘

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 脱机地；未连线地；离线地

word_family.mean: adv. 离开；在某地以外；掉；开；出发；结束；停止；关闭；断开；获得；拥有；一次的产量

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 关掉；让人倒胃口；让人扫兴；转上另一条路
请假；起飞；急速离开；成功
不要上(路)；远离(某地)；保持熄灭
把船撑离堤岸；离开；离去
成功；完成；实现；脱落；分离；停止服用麻醉药；戒除毒（或药）瘾；达到性交高潮；表现；进展
一笑置之；笑而不理；笑得...
偏离航向；偏航；偏离方向

examination_example.sentence: He fell <highlight>off</highlight> the horseback.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他从马背上摔下来了。

examination_example.sentence: She advised Stan to cut that beard <highlight>off</highlight> many times，but he never did it．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她多次建议斯坦把胡子剪掉，但他从来没有剪过。

examination_example.sentence: John suddenly jumped <highlight>off</highlight> the swing without even slowing down.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 约翰突然从秋千上跳下来，甚至没有减速。

examination_example.sentence: The Chinese government closed <highlight>off</highlight> fifty million people in Wuhan and cities near it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国政府封锁了武汉及其附近城市的五千万人口。

examination_example.sentence: Remember to turn <highlight>off</highlight> / shut <highlight>off</highlight> / switch <highlight>off</highlight>  the lights when you leave the classroom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 离开教室时记得关灯。

examination_example.sentence: She often forgot to turn <highlight>off</highlight> the gas and the food she was cooking usually got burnt.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她经常忘记关煤气，她正在做的食物通常会被烧焦。

examination_example.sentence: We mustn't get <highlight>off</highlight> the bus until it stops.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不能在公共汽车停下来之前下车。

examination_example.sentence: He took the Central Avenue bus and got <highlight>off</highlight> at Fifth Street.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他乘坐了中央大街的公共汽车，并在第五街下车。

examination_example.sentence: I have to get <highlight>off</highlight> the bus at the next stop.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我必须在下一站下车。

examination_example.sentence: For some teachers, this means bringing back a valuable lesson plan that has been put <highlight>off</highlight> for some time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对一些教师来说，这意味着恢复了一份已推迟一段时间的有价值的教案。

examination_example.sentence: He put <highlight>off</highlight> the plan till next week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他把计划推迟到下周。

examination_example.sentence: Understanding how brains reply to the sounds of drills could help relax patients，because patients might keep putting <highlight>off</highlight> their visits．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 了解大脑如何对牙医的钻探声音做出反应可以让患者更放松的方法，因为去看牙医的患者可能会推迟就诊。

examination_example.sentence: On the morning of a rainy day, he fell <highlight>off</highlight> a bike and hurt his legs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一个雨天的早晨，他从自行车上摔下来，伤了腿。

examination_example.sentence: I fell <highlight>off</highlight> my bike yesterday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我昨天从自行车上摔了下来。

examination_example.sentence: I was sorry the moment I saw her fall <highlight>off</highlight> the tree.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我一看到她从树上掉下来就很难过。

examination_example.sentence: Most of us would not set <highlight>off</highlight> on a journey, even a short one, without some ideas of where we wanted to go.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们中的大多数人都不会在不知道自己想去哪里的情况下开始一段旅程，即使是很短的旅程。

examination_example.sentence: At the age of twenty, Xu set <highlight>off</highlight> for the first time, leaving behind his mother and his new wife.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 二十岁那年，徐第一次出征，留下了母亲和新婚妻子。

examination_example.sentence: Sophie's father asked her to return the money with her allowance until it was paid <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 索菲的父亲让她用她的津贴还钱，直到钱还清为止。

examination_example.sentence: Finally my efforts paid <highlight>off</highlight>!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的努力终于有了回报！

examination_example.sentence: Perseverance Pays <highlight>off</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 坚持不懈得到了回报

examination_example.sentence: Many of the electronic devices we use every day, like our phones and computer screens, give <highlight>off</highlight> blue light.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们每天使用的许多电子设备，如手机和电脑屏幕，都会发出蓝光。

examination_example.sentence: Plants in danger give <highlight>off</highlight> a sweet smell.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 处于危险中的植物会散发出甜美的气味。

examination_example.sentence: A solar storm is caused by solar flares（太阳耀斑）: large explosions（爆炸）near the sun that can give <highlight>off</highlight> lots of energy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 太阳风暴是由太阳耀斑引起的：太阳附近的大爆炸可以释放出大量的能量。

examination_example.sentence: I liked to show <highlight>off</highlight> in front of others to earn their praise.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我喜欢在别人面前炫耀以赢得他们的赞扬。

examination_example.sentence: Hazel likes showing <highlight>off</highlight> in public
examination_example.sentence_trans: Hazel 喜欢在公共场合炫耀

examination_example.sentence: The Spanish La Liga soccer club has offered to fly to Spain, where he'll show <highlight>off</highlight> his "fancy footwork".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 西班牙西甲足球俱乐部已提议飞往西班牙，在那里他将展示他的“花哨的步法“.

examination_example.sentence: A huge thank-you goes out to the members that spent their days <highlight>off</highlight> helping those in need.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 向那些花了几天休息时间帮助那些需要帮助的人的会员们表示衷心的感谢。

examination_example.sentence: The group of firefighters spent their days <highlight>off</highlight> building a new walkway to her front door.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这群消防队员花了几天的休息时间修建了一条通往她前门的新走道。

examination_example.sentence: Go to bed and get up at the same time each day, even on weekends or your days <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天同一时间睡觉和起床，即使是在周末或休息日。

examination_example.sentence: Water runs through these pipes to cool <highlight>off</highlight> astronauts because wearing a space suit can make astronauts very hot!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 水流过这些管道来使宇航员凉快，因为穿宇航服会使宇航员非常热！

examination_example.sentence: One of the best ways to cool <highlight>off</highlight> on a hot summer day is to jump into a swimming pool.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在炎热的夏日消暑的最佳方式之一就是跳进游泳池。

examination_example.sentence: An art festival that calls attention to Chinese opera cartoons will kick <highlight>off</highlight> in Beijing on Thursday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个引起人们对中国戏曲动画片关注的艺术节周四将在北京开幕。

examination_example.sentence: Chine Operas Cartoon Festival Kicks <highlight>off</highlight> Thursday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国戏曲动漫节周四开幕。

examination_example.sentence: 50% <highlight>Off</highlight>  July 25th—Aug 1st
examination_example.sentence_trans: 7月25日至8月1日可享受50%的折扣

sense_info_list.zh: (hit it off)一见如故; 投缘

examination_example.sentence: My mentor and I hit it <highlight>off</highlight> right away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我和导师一见如故。

examination_example.sentence: As you complete each task, check it <highlight>off</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你完成每项任务时，做好登记。

examination_example.sentence: But when he grew up, he was better <highlight>off</highlight> than his childhood friends and lived a happier and healthier life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但长大后，他比儿时的朋友过得更好，过着更幸福、更健康的生活。

examination_example.sentence: The minute the alarm clock went <highlight>off</highlight>, I got up and took a quick shower.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 闹钟一响，我就起床冲了个澡。

word_usage.usage:
off 表示脱离表面或边缘
from 表示离开的起点，不指明方向
out of 表示从内向外脱离
